thread.title: Hollar: *HOT* Shopkins 8″ Plush ONLY $1 Each (Regularly $18) + Awesome Deal Idea
thread.title_full: Hollar: *HOT* Shopkins 8″ Plush ONLY $1 Each (Regularly $18) + Awesome Deal Idea

author: Mary (Stellar Sidekick)
title: Hollar: *HOT* Shopkins 8″ Plush ONLY $1 Each (Regularly $18) + Awesome Deal Idea
text:
Know a Shopkins fan? Hop on over to Hollar.com where you can score select Shopkins 8″ Plush starting at just $1! Just go here and scroll down to the very bottom of the page to find the ones that are on sale for this low price.
Even sweeter, through March 22nd, Hollar is offering Hip2Save readers an additional 30% off ONE item (excludes bundles) with promo code H2SMAR17 at checkout. Note that a $10 minimum order is required and you must be logged into your account to apply the code.

Check out this deal idea for new customers: Buy 2 Shopkins Lip Care Sets $5 (reg. $15)
Buy 1 Shopkins 8″ Plush $1 (reg. $18) – scroll to bottom to find quickly 
Buy 1 Shopkins 8″ Plush – Lippy Lips $1 (reg. $18) – scroll to bottom to find quickly 
Total = $12
Use promo code H2SMAR17 for 30% off one item – will deduct $1.50
Final cost $10.50 shipped for all 4 items!

If you’re a new Hollar customer , you’ll score FREE shipping on your first $10+ order or if you’re a returning customer, you can snag FREE shipping on a $25 order.
(Thanks, Kayla!)
